title: Tech Mahindra and Cisco Collaborate to Drive 5G Modernization with Routed Optical Networking - Analytics Insight
content: Tech Mahindra and Cisco Collaborate to Drive 5G Modernization with Routed Optical Networking  Analytics Insight
description: The collaboration between Tech Mahindra and Cisco aims to simplify the Internet transport networks by leveraging state-of-the-art optical and routing technologies to converge services over an IP Infrastructure enabling a high degree of automation.
